Lines: I'm the commander of this platoon, 2nd Lieutenant
Leo Brauer. Nice to meet you.
I'm sergeant Klaus Bertrand.
I mainly support captain with administrative job.
My real job is a MS pilot, though.
So there's a captain and a vice-captain, right?
I'm Sergeant Tord Bobrov. I've been MS pilot since
the start. Well, I'll be counting on you from now on.
That's reassuring. thank you, Seargant Tord.
I-I'm private Anne Friberg. Its my first time on
Earth... and my first actual combat. I'm sorry for
the inconvenience, I look forward to working together.
Nice to meet you private Friberg.
I hear you aptitude as combat operator is high.
I'm looking forward to seeing it, aren't I？
Well, first of all, please relax a little.
There is nothing stiff about Brauer's Team.
Leo, I think you should act more dignified.
You are distrupting discipline from start...
Oh, Klaus, don't be so harsh.
On battlefield unit is like a family, right？
Family...?
I'll do my best, Captain！
Hahhahahaha! Its nice being young...
I like it, Captain.
I guess I'll try my best as well.
Ah.Tord, Ann, I'm counting on you, right?
Now, its time for first mission of new Brauer's Team！
Everyone, prepare for sortie!
Roger that!
